name: Team Leader
description: I led the SignAI project, an innovative initiative in which we developed a Chilean Sign Language (LSCh) interpreter service using Artificial Intelligence. This project was proposed to the CITT of Concepción and developed by my team as a Final Project (CAPSTONE)
activities: I led, planned and managed the development of the project.
Won first place in “Social Impact” category.
Won second place in “Project of the Year” category at DemoDay 2024, DuocUC.
Best evaluated CAPSTONE project of 2024 in the Computer Engineering career.
